body_html: @ezyang I am testing an alternative patch by running CPU build and test on different machines (https://circleci.com/gh/pytorch/workflows/pytorch/tree/pull%2F13137). I am looping it many times to try to find timeouts, and there hasn't been any so far. I will update here when I can confirm that the patch can actually fix the issue.
